description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the remote code execution vulnerability in the Microsoft WDAC OLE DB provider for SQL Server:

1. Download and install the appropriate update package based on your system version from the official Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Restart your system to apply the changes.

**Details**:
- This update addresses a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability that could allow remote code execution. Ensure you are applying the correct KB article associated with your operating system version.
- Update packages can be found at the following URLs:
  - For Windows 11 Version 22H2: [KB5034765](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034765)
  - For Windows 11 Version 21H2: [KB5034766](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034766)
  - For Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5034763](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034763)
  - For Windows 10 Version 21H2: [KB5034774](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034774) 

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure you are running a supported version of Windows 10 or 11 as listed.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
